description: Performance is somewhat below expectations for full competence, but some elements of satisfactory performance are exhibited.
A rating at this level reflects that the individual is in a growth and learning mode in terms of organizational values and/or Job Competence.
Individuals in this category consistently meet expectations and at times exceed them in demonstrating organizational values.
Individuals in this category consistently exceed expectations in most of the organizational values.
Individual in this category demonstrated exceptional ability to exhibit organizational values.
